targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$SPAN),
  hostname AS host,
  dev,
  avg(util_percent) AS "util_percent"
FROM
(select time, hostname, dev, util_percent from $SCHEMA.host_io_stat_t WHERE dev in ($DISK))
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and hostname in ('$HOST_NAME') 
GROUP BY host, dev, 1
ORDER BY 1

alert.message: 每隔1m检测1次await，如果最大值超过400ms且持续2个周期，则触发告警
alert.name: IO - await趋势 alert

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$SPAN),
  hostname AS host,
  dev,
  avg(await) AS "await"
FROM
(select time, hostname, dev, await from $SCHEMA.host_io_stat_t WHERE dev in ($DISK))
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and hostname in ('$HOST_NAME') 
GROUP BY host, dev, 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time,dev,hostname as ahostname,await
FROM cluster2.host_io_stat_t
where $__timeFilter(time) 
ORDER BY 1
limit 100000

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$SPAN),
  hostname AS host,
  dev,
  avg(tps) AS "tps"
FROM
(select time, hostname, dev, tps from $SCHEMA.host_io_stat_t WHERE dev in ($DISK))
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and hostname in ('$HOST_NAME') 
GROUP BY host, dev, 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$SPAN),
  hostname AS host,
  dev,
  avg(svctm) AS "svctm"
FROM
(select time, hostname, dev, svctm from $SCHEMA.host_io_stat_t WHERE dev in ($DISK))
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and hostname in ('$HOST_NAME') 
GROUP BY host, dev, 1
ORDER BY 1

alert.message: 每隔12h检测1次磁盘使用率，如果最大值超过75，则触发告警
alert.name: 磁盘使用率监控(GB) alert

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$SPAN),
  mount_on,
  used_percentage as "percent",
  avg(kbavailable/1024/1024) AS "available"
FROM
  $SCHEMA.host_disk_usage_t 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and hostname in ('$HOST_NAME') 
GROUP BY 1, 2, 3
ORDER BY 1

select  time,hostname ahostname,mount_on,cast(substrb(used_percentage,0,char_length(used_percentage)-1) as Integer) as useper
FROM cluster2.host_disk_usage_t 
where $__timeFilter(time) and dev not in ('tmpfs','devtmpfs')
ORDER BY 1
limit 100000

alert.message: 每隔12h检测1次磁盘使用率，如果最大值超过75，则触发告警
alert.name: 磁盘inode使用监控 alert

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$SPAN),
  mount_on,
  iused_percentage as "percent",
  avg(ifree) AS "ifree"
FROM
  $SCHEMA.host_inode_usage_t 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and hostname in ('$HOST_NAME') 
GROUP BY 1, 2, 3
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time,hostname ahostname,mount_on,cast(substrb(iused_percentage,0,char_length(iused_percentage)-1) as Integer) as iuseper
FROM cluster2.host_inode_usage_t
where $__timeFilter(time) and dev not in ('tmpfs','devtmpfs')
ORDER BY 1
limit 100000

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$SPAN),
  avg(file_nr) AS "file_nr",
  avg(inode_nr) AS "inode_nr"
FROM
  $SCHEMA.host_other_resource_t
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and hostname in ('$HOST_NAME') 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: 文件句柄使用数量监控

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  avg(deleted_count) AS "count"
FROM
  $SCHEMA.host_fd_deleted_count_t
where hostname='$HOST_NAME'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

alert.message: 每6h检测1次僵尸进程，如果僵尸进程数量大于5，则触发告警
alert.name: 僵尸进程数量监控 alert

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  counts AS "count"
FROM
  $SCHEMA.host_zombie_count_t
where
  hostname='$HOST_NAME'
ORDER BY 1 desc
limit 100

SELECT
  time,hostname,
  counts AS "count"
FROM
  cluster2.host_zombie_count_t
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1 
limit 1000

SELECT
  time,username,pid,cpu,mem,start,command
FROM
  $SCHEMA.host_top_cpu_process_t
where 
  hostname='$HOST_NAME'
ORDER BY 1 desc, 2 asc

SELECT
  time,username,pid,cpu,mem,vsz,rss,start,command
FROM
  $SCHEMA.host_top_memory_process_t
where 
  hostname='$HOST_NAME'
ORDER BY 1 desc, 2 asc

SELECT
  time,username,pid,cpu,mem,vsz,rss,start,command
FROM
  $SCHEMA.host_top_memory_process_t
where 
  hostname='$HOST_NAME'
ORDER BY 1 desc, 2 asc

panels.title: test MEM使用率高进程监控（TOP20）

list.definition: select distinct dev from cluster2.host_io_stat_t  where dev not like 'dock%' order by 1
list.name: DISK
list.query: select distinct dev from cluster2.host_io_stat_t  where dev not like 'dock%' order by 1
